meanings.definition: Resembling a postcard in appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: The quaint little town had a postcardlike charm.
meanings.sent2: The picture-perfect sunset was postcardlike in its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fluffy fur was so postcardlike, it could have been a model.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as postcardlike as a picture-perfect scene.
meanings.sent5: The cozy cabin nestled in the woods had a postcardlike quality.

meanings.definition: Suitable for or resembling a postcard in size and shape.
meanings.sent1: The small, rectangular table was postcardlike in its dimensions.
meanings.sent2: The tiny house had a postcardlike appearance from the outside.
meanings.sent3: The miniature car looked postcardlike next to the giant truck.
meanings.sent4: The delicate teacup was postcardlike in its dainty size.
meanings.sent5: The little garden was postcardlike with its neat rows of flowers.
